alert.note: Alert for Little Belt and Highwood Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 19 at 3:17AM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 20 inches, with higher amounts over the higher peaks. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph at times. * WHERE...Little Belt and Highwood Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they have appropriate knowledge and gear and may want to consider alternate plans. Power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
